thread.title: David Creery and Marcia Creery
thread.title_full: Goway Travel reviewed by David Creery and Marcia Creery

author: David Creery and Marcia Creery
title: David Creery and Marcia Creery
text: From the time Juan picked us up at the airport until he brought us back he was delightful.loved the hotel Sofitel and its' location.Moving on to Cartagena again Elkin was waiting and treated us something special.The hotel changed our room and made our stay most comfortable.
